o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_Entity_AddMapping
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
Sub %Method%(obj) WriteDebug "[mdde_Entity_AddMapping] " & obj.UOL
'If there is no datasource, give an error If (obj.Model.DataSources.Count = 0) Then MsgBox _ "There are no DataSources defined for this model!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf _ & "Please add a data source with the required source models to this model first." _ ,vbExclamation _ ,"No data sources available" Exit Sub End If
' If there is only one data source, set it as active Dim objSelectedDS If (obj.Model.DataSources.Count = 1) Then Set objSelectedDS = obj.Model.DataSources.Item(0) ' There are multiple data sources, so the user should choose which data source this mapping belongs to. Else Dim objDSSelection : Set objDSSelection = obj.Model.CreateSelection ' Show an object picker for data sources (in this model) and store the selected object. Set objSelectedDS = objDSSelection.ShowObjectPicker("DefaultDataSource", "", "Please select a data source for the mapping", True, True, False) ' Delete the selection. objDSSelection.Delete() End If
' Exit the routine if there is no selected data source. If (objSelectedDS Is Nothing) Then Exit Sub End If
' Exit the routine if the datasource selected is not valid If Not(objSelectedDS.Stereotype = "" Or objSelectedDS.Stereotype = cMDDE_DATASOURCE_STEREOTYPE) Then MsgBox _ "The Data Source " & objSelectedDS.Code & " has stereotype " & objSelectedDS.Stereotype & " and cannot be used for creating MDDE mappings." & vbCrLf & vbCrLf _ & "Please select or add a Data Source with a valid stereotype." & vbCrlf & vbCrLf & _ "Valid stereotypes are: " & vbCrlf & vbCrLf & _ "- Data Source (MDDE)" & vbCrlf & _ "- (empty)" _ ,vbExclamation _ ,"No valid datasource available" Exit Sub End If
' If we cannot create a mapping in the given data source, report an error. If (objSelectedDS.CanCreateMapping(obj) = False) Then MsgBox "Cannot create a mapping on " & obj.Code & " using datasource " & objSelectedDS.Code Exit Sub
MsgBox _ "Cannot create a mapping on " & obj.Code & " using datasource " & objSelectedDS.Code & "!" _ ,vbExclamation _ ,"Cannot create mapping" Exit Sub End If
' Now we know we can create a mapping in the data source we ask the user to choose the primary source object (from any open model). Dim objPrimarySourceSelection : Set objPrimarySourceSelection = obj.Model.CreateSelection Dim objPrimarySource : Set objPrimarySource = objPrimarySourceSelection.ShowObjectPicker("Entity", "", "Please select the primary source object for the mapping", True, False, False) ' Delete the selection. objPrimarySourceSelection.Delete()
' If there is no primary source selected, the user pressed cancel, so we exit the routine. If (objPrimarySource Is Nothing) Then Exit Sub End If
' If the primary source object is selected, we can create the mapping with it's primary source (from) object. ' Create the new mapping in the selected data source for this entity (obj), set the new mapping as default and enforce the creation. Dim objNewMapping : Set objNewMapping = objSelectedDS.CreateMapping(obj, Nothing, True, True)
' Add a source object with join type 'From'. Dim objFromSourceObject : Set objFromSourceObject = objNewMapping.getExtendedCollection("mdde_SourceObjects").CreateNew() objFromSourceObject.SetNameAndCode objPrimarySource.Name, objPrimarySource.Code objFromSourceObject.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_JoinType", "From" objFromSourceObject.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_JoinedObject", objPrimarySource
End Sub
